metadata.name: Red Oracle
metadata.description:
"signals" is a series of audio/visual meditations.  

It is all about vibrations and relationships. The interactions of the harmonics, overtones and auditory oscillations are translated directly to visual representations allowing the experiencer to notice more subtle nuances in the sounds.  Heightened awareness of subtle vibration can lead to a deeper engagement with life and the world around you.  

Unlike language and rational thought, which uses a reference (sign) to stand for something else (signified), sound can be taken as a direct experience.  Meaning comes not through interpretation or translation, but through the direct experience and interaction with the vibrations themselves.

The world is sound. 

Form follows frequency. 

Interactions lead to resonance.  

Everything "comes to life" as a product of relationship.  

Engage the world directly.  

Being is an art form.
